title: Competitive:Inkzooka
paragraphs:
Duration:
Total: 6.5 Seconds, Deployment: 0.92 Seconds, Firing: 5.8 Seconds
The Inkzooka fires multiple tall projectiles that can hit people over walls, similar to the Rainmaker's projectiles.
When activated, the user has 5.8 seconds to fire as many shots as they desire, with each shot knocking the user backwards.
